name: Tending The Garden
description:
In Tending the Garden you play as a young farmer championing the cause of Christ. You do this in a very practical way by bringing order to your lot in life. Herd sheep, fight slimes, bats, and ghosts, and plant and grow veggies and flowers as you bring order to the chaos. 

This was a week-long game jam with the theme of "champion". I created this project as a solo dev utilizing visual art assets I found online and the More Mountains Top-Down Engine.
